name: Create Your Mermaid Avatar & Make Up Fashion Girls
name_original: Create Your Mermaid Avatar & Make Up Fashion Girls
description:
Love Mermaid? Then This App is For You! Create and Design your own Mermaid!

Feeling Excited After Watching the Mermaid? Can't stop thinking about Character Get this App Now!

Choose from a huge selection of costumes, masks, and more and make your very own character!

-Thousands of Characters Combinations!
-Hours of Fun!
-Really Easy to Use!
-Fun for Kids and Adults!

Share your Hero Creations with Family and Friends through Facebook, Instagram or Email.
